title: Western | A Lawman Is Born (1937 Cowboy film) directed by Sam Newfield

sources.title: Western | A Lawman Is Born (1937 Cowboy film) directed by Sam Newfield
sources.description:
The adventure trail with your hard-hitting, easy-loving Western star!
An outlaw falsely accused of murder realizes the only way to clear himself is to become a lawman. 

Original title: A Lawman Is Born (1937)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/ftPP3dwJSP4


Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: Harry F. Olmsted, George H. Plympton
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, Iris Meredith, Warner Richmond 
Genre: Colorized, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles).
02:23 Unexpected encounter leads to a dance invitation but trouble looms on the horizon in the Wild West.
10:36 Lawman faces imminent threat, seeks advice on preemptive action against suspect entering town.
16:06 Conflict escalates in town as two men threaten peace, leading to a tragic outcome and a lawman's intervention.
26:59 Support for Tom Mitchell as the next Sheriff grows among the townspeople.
33:22 Opportunity for a partnership in a land deal is proposed, but with a warning of consequences for non-compliance.
41:39 A lawman aims to uncover the fate of Tom Mitchell and manipulate the sheriff to take control of the town.
52:50 Conflict escalates as a new sheriff faces threats of being shot on sight in a western town.


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOQIrvVPHrt2cN14ktGA2Snw
